content:
Big Cotton - Chunky - Want to know how the clouds feel like? Ready to Knit like never before?
We all know that there is nothing better to enjoy knitting and wearing than a Luxuriously soft yarn! That is why we created our Big Cotton with our new Airjet tecnology which makes it the best yarn to Touch and squeeze all day! With our Big Cotton, You will finish your projects super fast, it will be super lightweight, will save tons of money because one skein lasts way longer than regular yarns and it is machine washable/Dry!

YARN BENEFITS

Super Lightweight construction making it different from other yarns.
Has WAY WAY more yards than a regular Chunky yarn has!
Made with extremely high quality fibers; You´ll love the touch of this yarn.
Pima Cotton! Feel the clouds or this yarn. There is no Difference!!
 YARN SPECS

Blend 100% Pima Cotton
Craft Knitting, Crochet
Ball Weight 3.5oz, 100gr
Yarn Weight Chunky
Yarn Lenght 155Yds (141mt)
Needles US 10 (6mm) - Or Bigger
Care Machine Washable / Dry
What can I do with this yarn?

This yarn is perfect for knitting anything in almost no time, it can be a Beanie, a Scarf or even a blanket, anything you like!

We give you the finest yarn, you just have to turn it into the perfect garment.
